instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Roll out pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to desired thickness. Place on a greased baking sheet.
3. Spread tomato sauce over the pizza dough.
4. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, pepperoni, mushrooms, black olives, and green peppers over the pizza.
5. Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.
